Name: Battle Royale Craft
About the game: / / Do you like shooting games? Enjoy playing Battle Royale Craft with cool pixel art and fast action gameplay! Welcome to an apocalyptic city with many characters which are fighting for survival. Only one will be the winner in this battle royale! Play against professional characters and be the champion in this match Features - Cool pixel art - Select different type of characters - Different type of guns - Sniper mode - First or Third person view - And many more...
